name: 2-(cystein-S-yl)-2-(1H-indol-3-yl)-acetonitrile, [reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (camalexin-forming)
definition: 2-(L-Cystein-S-yl)-2-(1H-indol-3-yl)acetonitrile + 2 [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + 2 Oxygen <=> Camalexin + Hydrogen cyanide + CO2 + 2 [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + 4 H2O
